query.description: Filter Fobs by type (fountain or bathroom)
Latitude to fetch Fobs around. If provided, must provide longitude!
Longitude to fetch Fobs around. If provided, must also provide latitude!
Radius to fetch Fobs within (in meters)
ID of user that created the Fob(s)
Filter fountains to those created on or after this date.  Unix epoch milliseconds timestamp.
Filter fountains to those created before or on this date.  Unix epoch milliseconds timestamp.

item.name: Get user contributions for specified user

query.description: Limit query to contributions on and after this date.  Unix epoch milliseconds timestamp.
Limit query to contributions up to and on this date.  Unix epoch milliseconds timestamp.

request.description: Uses an optimized database query to get user created fountains, bathrooms, ratings, and pictures. All contributions by that user basically.

response.name: Request successful. Returns user contributions.
